name: Containment Breach (satsuyafrango, Solidfox)
description:
Turn on Fullscreen!

Containment Breach is a suspenseful puzzle game set in mysterious space station where something has gone terribly wrong. 

Gather your wits to make it out of this doomed scenario...or not.

Thank you for the inspiring soundtrack, Christopher Baklid!

Check out his work at: https://soundcloud.com/christopherbaklid/sets/scifi-loops-pack-1
